title: Twisted first look: Nia Sharma’s sultry seductress avatar will blow your mind
text:
Nia Sharma’s hotness, Kishwer Merchantt-Suyyash Rai’s cute PDA : TV Insta of this week 
While many actress prefer continuing with one successful project for years, Nia Sharma has always been one for experimentation. After her stint on Jamai Raja ended, Nia went on to do Comedy Nights Bachao . The title of Asia’s third sexiest woman has brought varied offers to Nia and she got featured in a music video too. Nia will be seen next on Vikram Bhatt’s Twisted, which is a web-series. Actor Namit Khanna is romantically paired with her. The actress is very kicked about the digital platform and wants to explore it fully in the coming year. She has begun shooting for Twisted and treated her fans to her look from the digital show. (Also Read: Anita Hassanandani, Arjun Bijlani, Karanvir Bohra, Nia Sharma fill in their Insta accounts with the colours of love – check posts) 
The actress who is known as a style diva is wearing a black off-shoulder crop top with a slinky skirt. Slick middle parted hair and dark berry lips complete her look. Nia is channelises the retro glam look with a contemporary twist. With the handsome Namit as a co-star, we are keen to see the good-looking pair on TV. The actress’ music video Waada got over 2 million hits in no time. Nia flaunted a black swimsuit in the video with elan looking super hot. The actress’ dream is to feature in an international music video with a top singer. A post shared by Nia Sharma (@niasharma90) on Feb 22, 2017 at 5:03am PST 
Nia Sharma began her career with the show Kali – Ek Agnipariksha on Star Plus. She earned a lot of praise for her portrayal of Manvi in Ek Haazaron Main Meri Behna Hai where she went bald. Nia also shone as the glamorous Roshni in Jamai Raja. Her career has been quite illustrious so far. At the same time, she also made news for her risqué red carpet outings on TV award shows. Her biggest moment came in early January when she was crowned at Asia’s third sexiest woman by a magazine. She defeated the likes of Alia Bhatt and Katrina Kaif. Stay tuned to Bollywood Life for more scoop and updates…
